evidence.claim: Asenda Health utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions, enhancing scalability and efficiency in processing data.
The company implements HL7 FHIR standards to ensure interoperability among health information systems.
Asenda Health supports various X12 transaction sets for electronic claims processing, aligning with industry standards.
Utilization of Amazon RDS for scalable relational database solutions for health data management.

icp.icp_reason: Asenda Health focuses on healthcare data exchange; uses X12 transactions, indicating ICP alignment.
